page.title: 11GAMES WE PLAY
page.content: At school we like{skipping}. Whilst we are doing this we sing, "Up to Mississippi". Two people hold the end of the rope while two or three people skip. During this everyone is singing "Up to Mississippi, miss a skip you're out". Another game we play is called {two ball}. It is where you throw two tennis balls, one at a time, against the wall and catch them again. While doing this you sing. One of the songs we like is: "Robin Hood and his merry men, went to school at half past ten, teacher said, if your late again, I'll smack you on your B.U.M. " {Jacks}is a game where you have some jacks and a power ball. Throw the ball up and pick up 1 jack at a time with the same hand. Repeat, picking up 2 jacks each time,then 3 and so on until all have been picked up in one go.
